title: VR-Based Spaced Repetition Mathematics Vocabulary Acquisition Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental mathematical terminology and basic smartphone operation skills
context.additional_context: Designed for managerial professionals to acquire math-related technical terminology frequently used in their work through context-based learning in VR simulation environments.

learning_goals: Learners can reproduce 200 mathematics-specific terms required for work scenarios presented in VR simulation environments with over 85% accuracy
Learners can recall vocabulary acquired through spaced repetition systems at over 70% accuracy in evaluations conducted four weeks later
Through formative assessments, learners can identify individually weak vocabulary types and advance to the next stage upon achieving three consecutive correct answers

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
